# IPOR Fusion

> Yield optimization framework for automated on-chain asset management. Solidity/Foundry.

## Core
- [AGENTS.md](AGENTS.md): Project overview, architecture, build commands, conventions
- [INVARIANTS.md](INVARIANTS.md): Protocol safety invariants (economic, access control, fuse system, withdrawals)

## Core Contracts
- [PlasmaVault](docs/core/plasma-vault.md): Main ERC4626 vault, deposits, withdrawals, fuse execution
- [AccessManager](docs/core/access-manager.md): RBAC roles, timelocks, redemption delays
- [PriceOracle](docs/core/price-oracle.md): Asset pricing, Chainlink + custom feeds
- [WithdrawManager](docs/core/withdraw-manager.md): Scheduled + instant withdrawals
- [FeeManager](docs/core/fee-manager.md): Performance (HWM) + management + deposit fees
- [RewardsClaimManager](docs/core/rewards-claim-manager.md): Reward claiming + vesting
- [PreHooks & Handlers](docs/core/pre-hooks.md): PreHooks extensibility, callback handlers (Morpho, Euler)
- [Factory](docs/core/factory.md): Vault deployment orchestration, component factories
- [Readers](docs/core/readers.md): Off-chain query layer, UniversalReader
- [Vault Extensions](docs/core/vault-extensions.md): WrappedPlasmaVault, whitelist, referral
- [Zaps](docs/core/zaps.md): Single-tx deposit helpers, native ETH support
- [ContextManager](docs/core/context-manager.md): Cross-contract context preservation

## Patterns
- [Fuse Pattern](docs/patterns/fuse-pattern.md): How fuses work, types, lifecycle
- [ERC4626 Pattern](docs/patterns/erc4626-pattern.md): Vault standard extensions
- [Delegatecall](docs/patterns/delegatecall.md): Architecture, plugin system
- [Market IDs](docs/patterns/market-ids.md): Complete market ID reference
- [Substrates](docs/patterns/substrates.md): Market substrate system — encoding, per-market reference, security
- [Transient Storage](docs/patterns/transient-storage.md): EIP-1153 inter-fuse data passing

## Integrations — Lending
- [Aave V3](docs/integrations/aave-v3.md): Supply, borrow, collateral
- [Aave V2](docs/integrations/aave-v2.md): Supply (legacy)
- [Aave V4](docs/integrations/aave-v4.md): Hub & Spoke model
- [Compound V3](docs/integrations/compound-v3.md): Supply via Comet
- [Compound V2](docs/integrations/compound-v2.md): Supply via cTokens
- [Morpho](docs/integrations/morpho.md): Supply, borrow, collateral, flash loans
- [Euler V2](docs/integrations/euler.md): Supply, borrow, collateral, batch
- [Moonwell](docs/integrations/moonwell.md): Supply, borrow, market enable
- [Silo V2](docs/integrations/silo-v2.md): Supply collateral (borrowable/non-borrowable), borrow
- [Gearbox V3](docs/integrations/gearbox-v3.md): Pool supply, farm staking
- [Fluid Instadapp](docs/integrations/fluid-instadapp.md): Pool, staking
- [Liquity V2](docs/integrations/liquity.md): Stability pool

## Integrations — DEX & Liquidity
- [Uniswap](docs/integrations/uniswap.md): V2 swap, V3 swap, V3 LP positions
- [Curve](docs/integrations/curve.md): StableSwap NG, LP gauge staking
- [Balancer](docs/integrations/balancer.md): Proportional/unbalanced liquidity, gauge
- [Aerodrome](docs/integrations/aerodrome.md): Liquidity, gauge, slipstream positions
- [Velodrome](docs/integrations/velodrome.md): Superchain liquidity, slipstream
- [Ramses](docs/integrations/ramses.md): V2 concentrated liquidity positions
- [Pendle](docs/integrations/pendle.md): PT swap, redeem after maturity

## Integrations — Yield & Staking
- [ERC4626](docs/integrations/erc4626.md): Generic ERC4626 vault integration
- [Stake DAO V2](docs/integrations/stake-dao-v2.md): Reward vault staking
- [Yield Basis](docs/integrations/yield-basis.md): LT token supply

## Integrations — Swappers
- [Odos](docs/integrations/odos.md): Smart order routing swaps
- [Velora](docs/integrations/velora.md): ParaSwap Augustus swaps
- [Enso](docs/integrations/enso.md): DeFi execution engine
- [Universal Token Swapper](docs/integrations/universal-token-swapper.md): Generic swap executor

## Integrations — Other
- [Midas](docs/integrations/midas.md): RWA (mTBILL, mBASIS)
- [Ebisu](docs/integrations/ebisu.md): Trove management
- [TAC](docs/integrations/tac.md): Staking, delegation
- [Harvest](docs/integrations/harvest.md): Hard work execution
- [Lido](docs/integrations/lido.md): Ethereum staking
- [Spark](docs/integrations/spark.md): Spark protocol
- [Async Action](docs/integrations/async-action.md): Multi-step async operations
- [Maintenance](docs/integrations/maintenance.md): Instant withdrawal config, withdraw manager updates

## Rewards
- [Rewards Overview](docs/rewards/rewards-overview.md): Reward system architecture + all claim fuses
